com.marklogic.hub.job

Interface JobManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobManagerImpl

    public interface JobManager
    Handles jobs and their creation, status, and deletion.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JobManager create(com.marklogic.client.DatabaseClient jobClient)
      Creates and returns a JobManager object
      JobDeleteResponse deleteJobs(java.lang.String jobIds) 
      JobExportResponse exportJobs(java.nio.file.Path exportFilePath, java.lang.String[] jobIds)
      Export Job documents and their associated Trace documents to a zip file.

      Import Job documents and their associated Trace documents from a zip file.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static JobManager create(com.marklogic.client.DatabaseClient jobClient)
        Creates and returns a JobManager object
        Parameters:
        jobClient - the database client that is used to connect to the jobs database
        Returns:
        JobManager object

      • saveJob

        void saveJob(Job job)
        Saves the job to the database
        Parameters:
        job - - the job you want to save

      • saveJob

        void saveJob(Job job,
             com.marklogic.client.Transaction transaction)
        Saves the job to the database
        Parameters:
        job - - the job you want to save
        transaction - - the transaction that is to be used to write the job

      • deleteJobs

        JobDeleteResponse deleteJobs(java.lang.String jobIds)
        Parameters:
        jobIds - comma-separated list of jobIds to delete.
        Returns:
        comma-separated list of jobIds that were successfully deleted

      • exportJobs

        JobExportResponse exportJobs(java.nio.file.Path exportFilePath,
                             java.lang.String[] jobIds)
        Export Job documents and their associated Trace documents to a zip file.
        Parameters:
        exportFilePath - specifies where the zip file will be written
        jobIds - a comma-separated list of jobIds; if null, all will be exported
        Returns:
        a report of what was exported

      • importJobs

        void importJobs(java.nio.file.Path importFilePath)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Import Job documents and their associated Trace documents from a zip file.
        Parameters:
        importFilePath - specifies where the zip file exists
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to open or read the target input file
